name: Stack AI
description: Stack AI is a platform for deploying AI agents to automate enterprise back-office processes and enhance operational efficiency.
longDescription: Stack AI is an end-to-end platform designed for enterprises, particularly IT and Enterprise Architecture teams, to deploy AI agents without requiring coding skills. Its mission is to streamline back-office automation and foster AI-first workflows that improve efficiency and accuracy in handling unstructured data and complex analyses. The platform serves users by offering intuitive tools, pre-built templates, and integrations with leading AI models from providers like Anthropic and OpenAI. It addresses industry-specific challenges in sectors such as finance, operations, and healthcare, enabling faster processing of documents, tickets, and proposals. With a focus on security and compliance, Stack AI ensures data privacy through certifications like SOC2, HIPAA, and GDPR. Additionally, it supports on-premise deployments for organizations needing enhanced control over their AI infrastructure.
features: Build AI agents using a visual no-code interface, allowing for customizable user interfaces or ready-to-use API endpoints to streamline development.
Ensure enterprise-grade security with compliance to SOC2, HIPAA, and GDPR standards, including data processing controls and no training on user data.
Access an extensive library of pre-built use cases and templates inspired by real-world applications for quick customization and deployment.
Support on-premise or virtual private cloud deployments to provide greater control and integration within existing enterprise environments.
Automate document intelligence tasks, such as underwriting and reconciling unstructured documents, for faster and more accurate analysis.
Deploy AI helpdesk assistants to handle IT support queries efficiently, reducing response times and improving user satisfaction.
Implement smart ticket routing and triage to prioritize and assign issues automatically based on AI-driven insights.
Enrich CRM systems by scraping websites and filings to update customer data with relevant information.
Automate RFP responses and proposal drafts using AI to generate tailored content quickly.
Perform credit analysis with AI to review and benchmark financial data for informed decision-making.
Send automated summary emails generated by AI to keep teams informed on key updates and insights.
Facilitate lead generation through AI-automated research, identifying potential opportunities from various data sources.

faqs.question: What is Stack AI?
faqs.answer: Stack AI is a platform that enables enterprises to deploy AI agents for automating back-office processes. It provides an end-to-end interface focused on IT and enterprise architecture teams. The platform emphasizes no-code development, security, and industry-specific solutions.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Stack AI offers a free plan with 500 runs per month, 2 projects, and 1 seat. This allows access to core features like AI agent building. Community support is available via Discord.

faqs.question: What security measures does Stack AI provide?
faqs.answer: Stack AI is compliant with SOC2, HIPAA, and GDPR standards. It includes data processing controls and ensures no training on user data. DPAs are signed with major AI providers for added security.

faqs.question: Can I build AI agents without coding?
faqs.answer: Yes, Stack AI features a visual interface for building AI agents without any coding required. Users can create customizable UIs or API endpoints easily. This makes it accessible for non-technical teams.

faqs.question: What industries does Stack AI serve?
faqs.answer: Stack AI serves industries like finance, risk management, operations, and healthcare. It tailors solutions to specific workflows, such as document processing and CRM enrichment. Compliance features support regulated sectors.

faqs.question: Does Stack AI support on-premise deployment?
faqs.answer: Yes, on-premise deployment is available in the Enterprise plan. This allows for dedicated infrastructure and greater control. Virtual Private Cloud options are also supported.

faqs.question: How do I get started with Stack AI?
faqs.answer: Sign up for the free plan on the website to begin building AI agents. Explore pre-built templates for quick starts. For advanced needs, contact sales for Enterprise options.

faqs.question: What integrations does Stack AI offer?
faqs.answer: Stack AI integrates with major AI providers like Anthropic and OpenAI. It supports various inputs/outputs including text, image, audio, and video. Database connectivity is secure and compliant.

faqs.question: What kind of support is available?
faqs.answer: Free plan users get community support on Discord. Enterprise users receive dedicated solution engineers and infrastructure. All plans have access to documentation and templates.

faqs.question: What are 'runs' in Stack AI pricing?
faqs.answer: Runs refer to executions of AI agents or workflows on the platform. The free plan limits to 500 per month. Enterprise plans offer custom run limits based on needs.

faqs.question: Can Stack AI handle multimedia inputs?
faqs.answer: Yes, Stack AI supports text, image, audio, and video inputs/outputs. This enables diverse AI applications like document analysis or video processing. Features are available across plans.

faqs.question: Is Stack AI suitable for small teams?
faqs.answer: Yes, the free plan is ideal for small teams or individuals with limited projects. It provides core features without cost. Scaling to Enterprise is available as needs grow.
